title: Number of visitors to the World War II Memorial in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: In 2019 , World War II Memorial U.S. Park saw nearly 4.83 and a half millions visitors during the Year .
In 2016 , the World War II Memorial U.S. saw its largest volume of visitors accounting for about 5.07 millions .
World War II Memorial U.S. Park World War II Memorial U.S. is a large World War II Memorial U.S. forest located in central California .
gold: This statistic shows the number of recreational visitors to the World War II Memorial in the United States from 2008 to 2019 . The number of visitors to the World War II Memorial amounted to approximately 4.83 million in 2019 .
